note:
Cave pixie. Sufficiently accurate for poetry. There are cats.

I'm okay if people want to interact with me, follow me, or boost my toots.

Avatar description: My face (white person with auburn hair, a beard and glasses). I'm wearing a red flower behind my ear.

Header image description: A macro closeup of a gilt steel pen nib with "№ 42" inscribed on it.

fields.name: pronouns
fields.value: he/him usually, but I'm open to she/her

fields.name: web
